price: 133. Мре bakolobaka: Mpona nini ayeli biso likamwisi kowuta epai y a Nkolo naye te? Boye elembo (kurani) eye ekomama kala eyelaki bango te?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī al-ṣuḥufi al-ūlā
